title: Sword of the Emperor
content: Sword of the Emperor Rare 3~12 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+2 Slashing Shapeshifter Slayer: This weapon deals an additional 1d4 damage against shapeshifters or polymorphed creatures. Magical Durability: The wielder has a +2 bonus to Saving Throws against spells. Weapon Enchantment +2 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: There's a graceful swarthiness to this sword. The inscription in the steel reads - 'My eye wanders far from home / To shores of distant Anchorome.
